refnamediv.refpurpose: Enable or disable the dynamic adjustment of the number of threads within a process. The function takes the language-specific equivalent of true and false, where true enables dynamic adjustment of team sizes and false disables it.

listitem.para: Input argument (A nonzero value means threads will be dynamically adjusted.)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function enables or disables dynamic adjustment of number of threads within a process. By default, it is disabled
This function in turn calls the omp_set_dynamic function of omp library in C.
